message: Ho Ho Ho thank you for contacting me, do you want to talk about Christmas?
Well now, I am going to have to check my list and check it twice but can you tell me if you have been naughty or nice?
wrongMsg: Ho Ho Ho! I saw you last week being very nice!
rightMsg: You really are very nice, thank you so much for being good!
offenseMsg: Ho Ho Nooooo! I'm sorry, but its coal for you this year!

message: I can't wait to bring you presents this year! I am wondering, who's your favorite reindeer?
wrongMsg: I think you have me mixed up with the Easter Bunny!
rightMsg: Ho Ho Ho! That's my favorite too, but don't tell anyone, they get jealous!
offenseMsg: Ho Ho Nooooo! I'm sorry, but its coal for you this year!

message: I wish you and your family holiday cheer, my last question is what do you want for Christmas this year?
rightMsg: Ho Ho Ho! thank you! The elves will get to work on that right away!
offenseMsg: Ho Ho Nooooo! I'm sorry, but its coal for you this year!
